threedim.body:
Despite the commonalities shared by the two monks, they still value things differently.
Poor ladybug... The monks were brought to life through CG.

The new features of the Motokrazr, a slick new phone designed by Motorola for Alltel,
are accentuated by the hot and flashy hues of red and orange, a CG phone, and 2D cloud effects.

We were able to utilize CG to showcase the artful architecture of Callaway Golf's fusion FT Driver.
As we all know the design of the golfer's extended arm is the secret to having the perfect game.
What's your choice?

Using a complex character rig and cloth simulation, we delivered the message
that Dentyne Ice stripped its old image to reveal a more tantalizing product, the new Dentyne Ice soft chew.
It will make your taste buds come to life.

VFX Company Special Branch, a company known for their "No Photography" trademark
showcased their abilities in product rendering and 3D character animation in this promotional piece.

The Acura RDX is able to make smooth tight turns as if was attached to a grappling hook,
a concept that was cost effectively carried out by the use of CG.

Nike Slingshot's sexy curvaceous contour and unique geometric design was accentuated
through the use of reflective effects.

One of The Egg Republic's earlier characters wishes you a happy holiday with his butt shaking moves.
The character was designed on paper and then finished in CG with CG hair.

Pontiacs are becoming increasingly popular in major cities, a concept carried out by
abstractly reflecting cityscapes on the CG generated car models.

Pontiac Solstice's tagline “passion comes in many colors” was brought to life through lighting,
shading and paint effects.

Callaway golf balls are known for its technologically advanced intricate design. In order to do it justice,
we utilized our modeling skills to deliver a realistic close up of the product.

Winning a New York Times taste test in the highly competitive vodka market is a prestigious honor.
We created an elegant, blindfold animation to accentuate the monologue
using CG products and simulated cloth.

The sky is the limit when it comes to new products like Smirnoff's North.
The same can be said of CG. Anything is possible.

"Beauty is in the eyes of the beholder." Like other forms of art,
3D animation combines the artist's imagination
and technical skills to create a piece that others can admire.

The ultimate question that arises from this piece is, when will there be a machine that feels?
We created this piece through subsurface scattering, a shader algorithm from mental ray.
Something simple yet complicated.

web.body:
Absolut Global Cooling was Absolut's way of giving back to mother nature. For Every bottle purchased,
Absolut donated one dollar to one of three charities. The Egg Republic led the design of the site
as well as produced and integrated all 3D.

M&M's, one of America's favorite chocolate candies was due for an overhaul. It needed to keep its fun,
boyish charm, while catering to those who've grown up with the brand. Here we created the homepage
to resonate with a broad age group.

Crown Royal needed to let their audience know that they've created a smooth new whiskey.
We expanded their site to showcase the new product.

2046 is a gut wrenching film begging for a website with the same emotional characteristics.
A series of kaleidoscopic effects were used in conjunction with movie stills to mimic the mood
and emotions the movie stirs in its viewers.

As with most movies, promotional media such as websites and posters need to entice the audience
as well as allude to the story line. Here, the images from the site mirror each other to symbolize the dichotomy
of the protagonist while ever expanding landscapes capture the mood and scenery of the films Chinese landscape.

Mybluezebra.com is My Blue Zebra's portal to the world. Here, thousands of consumers around the world
connect via VOP everyday. We extended the same clean and lovable feel that the
My Blue Zebra logo and brand identity carries.

Vroengard Academy was an intricate website created to heighten anticipation for the fantasy book, Brisingr.
Interactive games, puzzles, and treasure hunts were all created to entice return users.

noknownsurvivors.com was created to promote a new EA Games release, Dead Space;
an action/horror 3rd person shooter.
Unique, a cool, fun, character customizer was created for pure fun. Check it out and enjoy.

Tammy Eckenswiller, fashion photographer, was in need of a online portfolio.
We created a simple functional and stylish online gallery.

A teaser site for travel collection designer, Karim Rashid. Simple and smooth animation work
capture audience attention and motivate viewers to sign up for a newsletter.

brand.body:
My Blue Zebra, a telecommunications company, was looking for a solid brand image.
They came to us to create it. Young, hip, and lovable, the My Blue Zebra logo
caters to the masses with a friendly and inviting aura.

Witie, a wireless network company, needed a logo that would align the brand with the service
it provides, Witie's logo signifies an "Always On" signal that connects a network of users.

As a small start-up focusing on urban apparel, Uniqform sought and identity that was clean yet catchy.
One crucial point was to make sure the logo would never interfere with any clothing designs.
Here, we created a logo that did just that.

Reign Threads, an upcoming t-shirt company needed a logo for their witty designer
shirts. We created a character that people could associate with the brand.
One that would stand out beyond today's crowded t-shirt design market.

The National Junior Collegiate Atheltic Association needed a logo that gave them an air of professionalism.
We gave them a logo that encompassed all sports and makes the NJCAA professional and unique.

brand.tmbtitle: ALONE IN THE DARK LOGO TYPE
brand.body:
Alone In The Dark is a first-in-its-class, genre defining, action horror video game series.
Atari was looking to take the genre to new heights with the latest release in the series,
with a total overhaul of the game.

CanDoPortal is a directory based service, providing a portal to local restaurants, bars, and clubs.
They wanted a fresh and appetizing brand that would attract a web savvy 16-40 year old audience.
Neomind Studio is an interactive development shop based out of Philadelphia.
Späk is ATV retail shop selling aftermarket accessories, gears, and performance parts.
Joa is a take-out Korean BBQ booth located in the upper west of New York City.

Base NYC a promotion company needed a mark to represent their company on all their media.
We created a simple and subtle logo to stand out against typical nightlife design.

Rock N Roll Racing on the SNES

meetcrew.txt: Anything with lots of butter, cream, or sugar

meetcrew.txt: I love nyc because of passionate people

meetcrew.txt: I love cute girls but hate mean dogs
